unknown_responses.rationale: The segment reports on identifying bird flu and the state's second case but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment confirms the case location but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on a disaster proclamation but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment contains the bare negation 'didn't immediately disclose the number of birds involved' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on resources for tracking and detection but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on birds being killed and disposed of but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment contains the bare negation 'ensure no other cases' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on the number of farms within a zone but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment describes a past outbreak and culling numbers but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on smaller past outbreaks but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on officials working to control and eradicate the disease but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment discusses potential future issues if the virus spreads but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on cases in multiple states but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment contains a bare negation ('not seeing a massive outbreak') but also explicit calming language ('it's too soon to be concerned'), so Q7 is not applicable.
The segment describes how the virus spreads but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment describes how the virus can spread but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment contains the bare negation 'do not present an immediate public health concern' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment contains the bare negation 'No human cases... have been detected' without an explicit calming cue.
The segment contains a Q5 Low-Risk cue ('it is unusual').
The segment reports on the first infection this year but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on additional cases and birds killed but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on virus detection and birds destroyed but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on infection and disposal of birds but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on identifying the virus on farms but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
The segment reports on confirming the virus discovery but contains no bare negation or explicit calming cue.
